Title: Increase your LLM rate limits for free
introduction:
We're thrilled to introduce our latest feature: Load balancing! 

There are 2 ways to load balance your LLM requests. First, you can specify weights for the models you want to load balance in the code, ensuring that requests are distributed based on your desired percentages. 

The second way is to easily add your credentials and set the weight for each one to distribute requests efficiently between deployments.

New.description: Added usage page, where you could see your detailed usage by model, provider, and features on Settings page.
You can now handpick logs and add them to your datasets!
Added display button on Datasets page, you can now choose which column should be displayed.

Improved.description: Improved proxy performance, the latency is reduced by 50%!
Improved full-text search performance, you could now search exact words.
You can now update the prompt's title and description.
Added empty page and parent page for datasets.

Fixed.description: Fixed a bug you can't use the shortcut to open Display panel.
Fixed a bug where the user's applied filter was not reflected in auto-refetching.
Fixed a bug where user could not run log when opened in Playground.
